version_description: Huge update, many new games and activities - a bright collection of fun puzzles devoted to all curious children who love trucks and vehicles.

Become a firefighter! Drive and play with the fire truck! Save the world from fire!
* 14 fabulous animated trucks (Ice cream truck, Fire truck, Dump truck, Excavator, Crane truck, Police car, Pickup truck, School bus, Road roller, Tractor, Ambulance...
* Moving truck parts and realistic sounds
